translations: n．解雇，开除：从工作岗位上解雇或开除某人的行为。
· The company announced a series of sackings.
公司宣布了一系列的解雇行动。

sentences.sentence: There was yet another round of sackings.
He described talk of sackings as scare stories.
sentences.translation: 他说关于洗劫的那些议论都是些耸人听闻的故事。

sentences.sentence: But as Banks face up to a protracted period of much lower growth, sackings have picked up again.
sentences.translation: 不过，众银行面对长期的超低增长率，不得不重操旧业——继续裁员。
